name: Mystical Abandon
title: Shenhe: Mystical Abandon
desc: Transfigure, and let my will be embodied!
inPlayDescription: When the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Icy Quill created by your Shenhe, who has this card equipped, is triggered by your characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks, its Usages will not decrease. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Shenhe to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shenhe, equip this card.After Shenhe equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Spring Spirit Summoning once.When the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Icy Quill created by your Shenhe, who has this card equipped, is triggered by your characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks, its Usages will not decrease. (Once per Round)(You must have Shenhe in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
